title: The 'Boys and Girl - Thanksgiving Day Disaster; Michael Bennett Goes Off; Jerry Gets Emotional; Garrett Safe, For Now
itunes:title: The 'Boys and Girl - Thanksgiving Day Disaster; Michael Bennett Goes Off; Jerry Gets Emotional; Garrett Safe, For Now
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby discuss the fallout from the Cowboys' disappointing Thanksgiving loss to the Bills, Michael Bennett going off in the locker room after the game, Jerry Jones' emotional postgame comments, Jason Garrett being granted a temporary stay of execution by Jerry, and where the team goes from here. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
